text: Overfitting is when the training error is very less so that it becomes 0 but the model  doesn't perform well on the testing data.  So that is called overfitting, it can be prevented by reducing the complexity of the model.

segments.text: Overfitting is when the training error is very less so that it becomes 0 but the model
doesn't perform well on the testing data.
So that is called overfitting, it can be prevented by reducing the complexity of the model.
